summary: Frontend testing completed for Prospect section sidebar navigation restructure. All 4 scrapper pages (1.1 Pharma Pipelines, 1.2 LinkedIn Jobs, 1.3 Dealmakers, 1.4 LinkedIn Posts) load correctly with proper titles, descriptions, and color themes. Sidebar navigation shows expandable '1. Prospect' section with all 4 sub-items. Run Now button and Weekly Schedule configuration work correctly on all pages.
passed_tests: Login with credentials perla@leaderlix.com works correctly
Default redirect to /prospect/1-1-pharma-pipelines after login
Sidebar shows expandable '1. Prospect' section
Sub-item '1.1 Pharma Pipelines' visible in sidebar
Sub-item '1.2 LinkedIn Jobs' visible in sidebar
Sub-item '1.3 Dealmakers' visible in sidebar
Sub-item '1.4 LinkedIn Posts' visible in sidebar
Route /prospect/1-1-pharma-pipelines loads PharmaPipelines component with title '1.1 Pharma Pipelines'
Route /prospect/1-2-linkedin-jobs loads LinkedInJobs component with title '1.2 LinkedIn Jobs'
Route /prospect/1-3-dealmakers loads Dealmakers component with title '1.3 Dealmakers'
Route /prospect/1-4-linkedin-posts loads LinkedInPosts component with title '1.4 LinkedIn Posts'
Pharma Pipelines description: 'Extract medications from pharmaceutical company pipelines'
LinkedIn Jobs description: 'Scrape job positions and career changes from LinkedIn'
Dealmakers description: 'Extract LinkedIn profiles from existing opportunities'
LinkedIn Posts description: 'Extract posts from specific LinkedIn profiles'
Run Now button visible and enabled on all scrapper pages
Weekly Schedule section displays correctly on all pages
Configure button opens schedule dialog
Schedule dialog shows Enable Automatic Runs toggle
Schedule dialog shows Active Days selection (Mon, Wed, Fri default)
Schedule dialog shows Run Time dropdown (09:00 default)
Schedule dialog has Cancel and Save Schedule buttons
Navigation between scrapper pages works correctly
Each page has unique color theme (green/blue/purple/yellow)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Prospect section navigation restructure completed and verified. The sidebar now shows '1. Prospect' as expandable section with 4 sub-items (1.1-1.4). Each scrapper has its own dedicated page at /prospect/1-X-scrapper-name routes. All pages use the reusable ScrapperPage component with unique scrapperId, name, description, icon, and color props. Schedule configuration is stored in localStorage under 'scrapper_schedules' key.

sidebar_navigation.details: 1. Prospect section expandable with 4 sub-items: 1.1 Pharma Pipelines, 1.2 LinkedIn Jobs, 1.3 Dealmakers, 1.4 LinkedIn Posts

scrapper_pages.details: Each page shows correct title, description, stats, Weekly Schedule, Recent Runs, Results sections

run_now_button.details: Button visible and enabled on all pages (not tested actual execution to avoid Apify costs)

schedule_configuration.details: Configure button opens dialog with Enable toggle, Active Days, Run Time, Cancel/Save buttons

color_themes.details: Pharma=#00ffaa (green), LinkedIn Jobs=#0099ff (blue), Dealmakers=#aa00ff (purple), LinkedIn Posts=#ffcc00 (yellow)
